title: Ring, mid-19th century
dimensions: H x diam.: 1.2 x 2 cm (1/2 x 13/16 in.)
description: Gold ring separating into two bands on which is an ornament of a flower (made of gold) with petals of rose diamonds.  At the sides of the ring are small flowers with rose diamond centers.  Two small diamonds missing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Ring, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Gold, rose diamonds. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-84-8.
